attributes.action: Hold a General Election in Autumn 2016
attributes.additional_details: We call on the government to dissolve parliament before the Autumn Party conferences, and to hold a General Election. Additionally, David Cameron should remain as caretaker Prime Minister until this General Election.
attributes.background: The result of the EU referendum and the decision of David Cameron to resign as Prime Minister means we will have a new Prime Minister who was not a party leader at the time of 2015 General Election, implementing a programme that never put to the electorate. This is democratically unacceptable.
